text: Makes it quite hard to test changes against repeating visitors/customers :see_no_evil:

Hi All,

I’m building a custom module that contains a short video that autoplays next to the content. to achieve this i am using the code provided in the default video.module from HubSpot. This all goes well except that the container containing the video has an unusual aspect ratio meaning that my video (16:9) is being cropped. This is fine as i need it to cover the container and is just there to set the mood. but it also crops the controls off the video. Is it possible to move the controls up to be visible in the container but keep the video cropped?

Hey! :slightly_smiling_face: Newbie Coder here! When i rotate my accesstoken i dont have to change any Custom coded workflow actions if they use a secret right? :slightly_smiling_face: they access token gets changed automatically then with the secret or? :slightly_smiling_face:

Hello there,
This is Santhoshkumar, a web developer

I'm using a HubSpot form for all kinda forms on my website, especially signup. I'm using this HubSpot form for form submission followed by the Revenue Hero meeting scheduler. I could see that the HubSpot form accepts numbers and special characters in the name fields such as first and last names. So, there is a possibility of injecting the anonymous code into the field which is against our security policy.  So, I need to restrict those by setting the rules. I have explored some community forums for <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Custom-validation-or-prevent-form-submission/m-p/666857|Custom validation or prevent form submission> - which recommends adding custom validations on the form fields by preventing the default behavior of the form submission. This actually works as expected on form validation but after the form submission, the Revenue Hero meeting scheduler is not showing up.

I have also explored some documentation that says that the rules can be set up only while creating a property that is even for custom property, not for default property. I can't able to set rules for the default names field property.

I want to restrict the numbers and special characters in the name fields. So, could you please assist me with this?

Thanks in advance,
Santhoshkumar R
This isn't possible because a draft post shouldn't show publicly, the feed relies on a published blog post to determine visibility.
Not sure if you can change the compression but if you convert your image to a webp yourself and compress it the amount you like, there is a chance HubSpot won’t compress it further
thank you :slightly_smiling_face:

Have you tried in an incognito window,
If your redirect was a 301 (permanent redirect) your browser will assume it’s permanent so it will cache the redirect for a while

Also you can use something like this to see if the redirect is in place / what the whole redirect chain is if there a re multiple redirects
<https://www.whatsmydns.net/redirect-checker>
Also I obviously can’t see the image, but if you have any control over it, if it’s a gradient with vectors over the top, an SVG would give a much smaller file size
yes, agreed, thanks so much for reply :slightly_smiling_face:

Oh one last thing if you want to hack it so it doesn’t get compressed at all, just put the image as an embeded image in an SVG file. HubSpot will leave the file alone, but I don’t know how efficent doing it this way is

`Without validation your meeting tool does show up?` - Yes
2. `With your validation the form is actually submitting to HubSpot? (you can see the submission in HubSpot)`  - Yes, I can see the submission in HubSpot.
Do you mean paste pure HTML? or just <img src="image.svg"> :slightly_smiling_face:
So in something like illustrator create a cavas the size of your image, add your image, then save as an SVG and use the “Embed” images option Then use
it’s very hacky though
wow, didn't know such option exist, although I do not use Adobe at all so maybe some day, thank you so much Matt for the answer!

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!
Hi There- has anyone built out a custom SCIM process to provision users via Azure AD ? HubSpot doesn't have this out of the box
Hi <@UJAPS2K4N>, I have disabled it, but even though it is showing. dont know where it is coming from.

A few things you can check:
• Have you cleared your browser cache?
• Does the theme base.html/layout.html (or similar) has jQuery in it
• Do modules have either `{{ require_head }} <script src="PATH-TO-JQUERY"></script>{{ end_require_head }}` or an linked jQuery file(in the right sidebar at the bottom)
• Open the page and click "update". Might solve it aswell, since it will rebuild the existing page
Further testing options can be:
1. Create a new page
2. add `<meta name="robots" content="noindex,nofollow">` to the page header in the site settings
3. add all modules to this page
4. preview the page in a new tab
5. delete a module
6. hard-refresh(chrome shortcut: crtl+shift+r) the page several times
7. inspect the page if jQuery is still loading
8. repeat step 5-7 until the page has no modules
I was having issues with CTAs in general. Not slide in ones. We don’t currently have any slide-in CTAs. Sorry!

do you still think it is cache problem???

As far as I know, it's possible to add extra classes to the dnd section within the code, like in Design Manager or locally.

It'd be amazing to have an option to do that within the Content Editor

Hey <@U7SL518D6> is there anything like that in the works?
Totally! But after questioning them again, apparently it is by design?!?

I ended up making a page template and copying over my sections with the developer mode, but it would be amazing if I could do it on the fly in the content editor. I'd also request being able to add classes to rows and columns.
Hi everyone! I want to upload or record a call to my Developer test account so I can test if my integration works. Anyway I can do this without having to upgrade to Starter Customer Platform?
I figured it out! You can make a list of fake data and upload it as a csv. Should be could enough to test for now.
